sentence: I ate an apple for breakfast.

comment: A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers.
sentence: She enjoys reading a good book before bedtime.
The cat climbed up the tree.

comment: A domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout, an acute sense of smell, and a barking, howling, or whining voice.
sentence: She took her dog for a walk in the park.

comment: A very large plant-eating mammal with a prehensile trunk, long curved ivory tusks, and large ears.
sentence: We went on a safari and saw elephants in the wild.

comment: The seed-bearing part of a plant, consisting of reproductive organs surrounded by colorful petals and modified leaves.
sentence: He gave her a bouquet of beautiful flowers.

comment: A stringed musical instrument played with the fingers or a plectrum, typically having six strings.
sentence: He strummed the guitar and sang a song.

comment: A building for human habitation, especially one that is lived in by a family or small group of people.
sentence: They moved into a new house last month.

comment: A piece of land surrounded by water.
sentence: They went on a vacation to a tropical island.

comment: A dense forest in a tropical or subtropical region with a large amount of vegetation.
sentence: They explored the dense jungle and discovered new species of plants.

comment: A large herbivorous marsupial with a long powerful tail and strongly developed hindlimbs that enable it to travel by leaping.
A portable computer that is small and light enough to be used on one's lap.
sentence: She brought her laptop to the coffee shop to work.

comment: A large natural elevation of the earth's surface rising abruptly from the surrounding level; a large steep hill.
sentence: They hiked to the summit of the mountain.

comment: A very large expanse of sea, in particular, each of the main areas into which the sea is divided geographically.
sentence: The ship sailed across the ocean.

comment: A dish consisting of a flat round base of dough baked with a topping of tomato sauce and cheese, typically with added meat or vegetables.
sentence: They ordered a large pizza for dinner.

comment: The female ruler of an independent state, especially one who inherits the position by right of birth.
sentence: The queen waved to the crowd from her carriage.
